Simulated Example

Source: vignettes/a1-sim-example.Rmd
a1-sim-example.Rmd
library(DPH)

Here is a simulated example which shows you how to use DPH:

sim_data
#> # A tibble: 1,000 x 4
#>     time status pred1 pred2
#>    <int>  <int> <dbl> <int>
#>  1     5      1  1.37     1
#>  2     5      1  2.18     0
#>  3     1      1  1.16     0
#>  4     1      1  3.60     0
#>  5     2      1  2.33     1
#>  6     3      1  1.18     1
#>  7     1      1  2.49     0
#>  8     1      1  2.74     0
#>  9     2      1  2.58     1
#> 10     3      1  1.69     1
#> # … with 990 more rows
time <- sim_data$time
status <- sim_data$status
pred <- sim_data[, -(1:2)]

Outcome summary of the simulated data:

tbl <- table(time, status)
addmargins(tbl)
#>      status
#> time     0    1  Sum
#>   1      0  293  293
#>   2      0  294  294
#>   3      0  181  181
#>   4      0   94   94
#>   5     86   52  138
#>   Sum   86  914 1000

Standard DPH Model

dph(
  time = time, 
  status = status, 
  pred = pred
)
#> $beta
#>      pred1      pred2 
#>  0.6756909 -0.0148435 
#> 
#> $lambda0
#>      time1      time2      time3      time4      time5 
#> 0.07721568 0.14293477 0.18430145 0.20137149 0.20908461 
#> 
#> $loglik
#> [1] -1432.959
#> 
#> $FPR
#> # A tibble: 1,000 x 6

ADPH Model

Case 1

adph(
  time = time, 
  status = status, 
  pred = pred,
  sens = 0.8,
  spec = 0.9
)
#> $beta
#>       pred1       pred2 
#>  1.25150008 -0.05117965 
#> 
#> $lambda0

Case 2

adph(
  time = time, 
  status = status, 
  pred = pred,
  sens = 0.8,
  spec = 0.9,
  sens_known = FALSE
)

adph(
  time = time, 
  status = status, 
  pred = pred,
  sens = 0.8,
  spec = 0.9,

Case 4

adph(
  time = time, 
  status = status, 
  pred = pred,
  sens = 0.8,
  spec = 0.9,
  sens_known = FALSE,  
  spec_known = FALSE
)

ADPH2 Model

Model Fitting

system.time(
  adph2_model <- adph2(
    time = time, 
    status = status, 
    pred = pred
  )
)
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>  12.132   0.074  12.207
adph2_model
#> $fit
#> $fit$convergence
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $fit$loglik
#> [1] -1407.677
#> 
#> $fit$beta
#>       pred1       pred2 
#>  1.07083471 -0.02332944 
#> 
#> $fit$lambda0
#>     time1     time2     time3     time4     time5 
#> 0.0475508 0.1152488 0.1599523 0.1843778 0.2148209 
#>

Perturbation Resampling

system.time(
  adph2_model <- adph2(
    time = time, 
    status = status, 
    pred = pred,
    n_ptb = 10
  )
)
#> Warning in log(S0[index]): NaNs produced
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>  53.535   0.291  53.829
adph2_model
#> $fit
#> $fit$convergence
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $fit$loglik
#> [1] -1407.677
#> 
#> $fit$beta
#>       pred1       pred2 
#>  1.07083471 -0.02332944 
#> 
#> $fit$lambda0
#>     time1     time2     time3     time4     time5 
#> 0.0475508 0.1152488 0.1599523 0.1843778 0.2148209 
#>

#> 0.743380875 0.674857434 0.614569251 0.618800219 0.002991268 
#> 
#> $fit$FPR
#> # A tibble: 1,000 x 6
#>    score_cut    time1    time2    time3     time4     time5
#>        <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>
